snippet: Prosecutors in an activist’s trial presented a home video of his wife belly-dancing as evidence against him on Wednesday.
abstract: Egyptian prosecutors present home video of activist and blogger Alaa Abd El Fattah's wife belly dancing as evidence against him; he is being retried on charges of protesting and beating a police officer after being sentenced to 15 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in an activist’s trial presented a home video of his wife belly-dancing as evidence against him on Wednesday.

headline.main: Egypt: Wife’s Dancing Offered as Evidence on Activist
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Wife’s Dancing Offered as Evidence on Activist
